In September 2024, hyperscaler capex estimates for 2026 sat at $284 billion. 

As of November 2025, estimates sat at $527 billion, a nearly 86% increase in just over a year, per GS.

$RKLB from an options structure standpoint continues to show bullish speculation. The key is holding above the transition level (grey box) 89-90. The highest speculation continues to be at the 100 strike.
$RKLB needs to continue to hold the 8day
$ONDS is good to us. We‚Äôll see if it stays special

üì∫ THE SMART WAY TO HANDLE EXTENDED #GOLD AND #SILVER MOVES

$GLD and $SLV remain in strong uptrends, but they‚Äôre extended, so discipline matters.

Trim profits gradually, don‚Äôt chase, and don‚Äôt flip short just because you sold early or think it‚Äôs overbought.

Sometimes the best trade is waiting for the next setup.
$qqq follow up as we see how it handles yesterday‚Äôs low for tactical cash flow

üì∫ WHY YOU DON‚ÄôT RUSH IN AFTER A BIG SELLOFF

With large ‚Äúholes‚Äù in $SPY / $QQQ and price now below key moving averages (21/50), the focus shifts to whether the market can reclaim the 50-day or stay below it, which would signal weaker demand and potential downside toward the 100-day.

This is a time to slow down, reduce exposure, protect P&L, and focus on control‚Äînot conviction‚Äîuntil price action improves.
$SPX is acting very tentative after yesterday‚Äôs gap-and-go to the downside. We‚Äôre now below the 8/21day and even lost the 50day, so this is a more tactical tape‚Äîless swing, more day trades.

The spread of livestock parasites can severely disrupt cross-border cattle flows, highlighting how animal health events can quickly affect supply chains, trade, and regional pricing.

Source: Reuters

Sergio Mendez, head of the grain traders lobby ANEC, estimates Brazilian traders will ship 77M metric tons of soybeans to China this year, 10 million tons less than in 2025, driven by increasing Chinese purchases of the oilseed from the US.

Source: ADM

Thank you for sticking by me.

For following me.

I share my analysis, my failures, my successes, and my vulnerabilities.

Maybe it works against me.

I don‚Äôt know.

It‚Äôs not for everyone, and I know a lot of people mute/block me.

No one is in Consumer Staples.

Everyone is in Tech.

Think.
100% agree on that you have been right on small caps - I moved all in on those in Oct. free markets is a great focus which will help a lot more this year.

I have said ‚ÄúI have suffered long enough‚Äù many times here on X.

And that‚Äôs why I am stronger than ever.

Ready for the cycle.

There are no gurus.

Only cycles.

And the scars left waiting for that cycle to come your way.
